title: BEA, 5 CARAT LAB WHITE SAPPHIRE GOLD DROP EARRINGS
description:
SOLD AS A PAIR.
The Bea drop earrings are crafted with 5 carats of pear and oval shaped lab-grown sapphires set in 18-karat gold-coated sterling silver with a 14-karat gold post. Pair with the Bellamy drop earrings for a graduated ear.
details:
Metal: 18k Gold-coated sterling silver
Setting: 4-prong
Stone Type: Lab-grown white sapphire
Stone Shape: Pear and oval cut
Post: 14k solid gold



5 CTW DEW

What is Lab-Grown?
